column1: In defects of BC6ENTG , BC6OTHER is transformed to BC6ENTC , resulting in high levels of BC6OTHER in the body. CPR:falsenewlineIn defects of BC6ENTG , BC6OTHER is transformed to BC6OTHER , resulting in high levels of BC6ENTC in the body. CPR:falsenewlineOnce formed, the molecule can be converted to BC6ENTC by BC6ENTG ( BC6OTHER ). CPR:9newline
